articles.author: Nathan H. Dize
articles.title: 'They're eating pets' – another example of US politicians smearing Haiti and Haitian immigrants - The Conversation
articles.description: Trump’s baseless claims about migrants in Springfield, Ohio, reflect a long history of American prejudice against Haitians. In Washington, those falsehoods have driven policy.
articles.content:
Republican vice presidential candidate JD Vance continues to defend the false claim that migrants in Springfield, Ohio, have been abducting and eating area cats and dogs.
That outlandish idea has be… [+7196 chars]
